summary: This document is a 2020 fee schedule for Dr. Kimberly Mchlman-Orozco, Ph.D., detailing her hourly rates for criminal case consultation, deposition, trial, travel expenses, and cancellation fees. It specifies billing through Break the Chain LLC and references GSA rates for expenses.

persons.name: Kimberly Mchlman-Orozco
persons.context: Listed as the professional providing criminal case remote research, review, consultation, in-person deposition, and trial services at specified hourly rates.

events.title: Fee Schedule Update
events.description: Implementation of updated fee schedule for Dr. Kimberly Mchlman-Orozco's services, including new mileage rate.

keyFacts: Dr. Kimberly Mchlman-Orozco offered criminal case research, review, consultation, deposition, and trial services at hourly rates of $350 for remote work and $500 for in-person events as of 2020.
Travel expenses and non-working travel time were billable, with mileage charged at the GSA rate (57.5 cents per mile as of January 1, 2020).
A cancellation fee of $1,500 applied if scheduled meetings, depositions, or trial dates were cancelled within seven calendar days prior to the event.
Billing was handled through Break the Chain LLC, with payment due within 30 days of invoice receipt.
